description: This file defines a React component named 'Profile' responsible for displaying and editing user profile information within a web application's user interface. It manages fetching, displaying, and updating profile data, and provides UI elements such as input fields and buttons.

methods.name: Profile()
methods.description: React functional component for rendering and managing user profile information.

methods.name: onChange
methods.description: Event handler for updating profile state when form inputs change.

methods.name: onSave
methods.description: Event handler for submitting updated profile data to the server.
